english.segment1: So what. So I think you know. That you. Were the first to go
english.segment2: Through lonely towns with one way streets. Met the ones I'd love to meet. By driving cars, deliveries. You're the one who played the keys
english.segment3: It's odd. How you always notice when the world gets you down. I find it odd. How you always notice when the world gets you down
